Name: Biofilm Coverage
Description: Percentage of electrode surface covered by biofilm

Name: Microorganism Species
Description: Primary microorganism species used in the system
Options: Geobacter sulfurreducens;Shewanella oneidensis;Mixed Culture;Pseudomonas aeruginosa;Clostridium acetobutylicum

Name: Cell Density
Description: Number of viable cells per unit volume

Name: Power Density
Description: Power output per unit electrode area

Name: Open Circuit Voltage
Description: Voltage when no current is flowing

Name: Internal Resistance
Description: Total internal resistance of the system

Name: Coulombic Efficiency
Description: Ratio of electrons harvested to electrons available

Name: Dissolved Oxygen
Description: Concentration of dissolved oxygen in solution

Name: Ionic Strength
Description: Measure of ion concentration in solution

Name: Anode Material
Options: Carbon Felt;Carbon Cloth;Graphene Oxide;Stainless Steel;MXene;Carbon Brush;Titanium
